about: This module is an simple installation for Zen Cart 1.5.4 and Tested on PHP 5.2.17, 5.3.13 and 5.4.26. It may very well work on other Zen cart versions too.

releases.description: Added Manufacturers Name, Minimum Per Order and CSV dowloand

features: Ability to get a report for the items in stock
Display's Product ID, Product Name, Categories Name, Manufacturers Name, Products Quantity, Minimum Order per Product, Products Price, Total Value of Invnetory
Ability to refine the search by category
Sort the report by any of the coulmns
Paginate or See all of the report
Download a CSV of the Report

installationHeader: Need this module installed for you? We can do that here >>
installationSteps: FIRST MAKE A FULLE BACKUP OF YOUR WEBSITE'S FILES AND DATABASE!
Upload your files (merging when needed) maintaining the folder structure, changing & "YOUR_ADMIN" to their respective folders from the catalog folder.
That's all. You will find your new report in your administration interface under the reports menu called "Inventory Report".
You will need to refresh your admin interface to load the new menu item.
uninstallSteps: Simply remove the package files for a full uninstall.
